settings.item_title: How long will it take to receive my purchases?
settings.item_content:
All orders placed with Aalkami London are processed and shipped within 1-2 business days after the order is placed. For UK orders, delivery typically takes 2-3 working days. For international orders, delivery typically takes 5-7 working days.
These are general guidelines and some delays may occur depending on the courier.
